column1: full, pushed away down the leg side, so the contest starts with a wide...low carry to the keeper
straightens the line, back of a length, smacks into the pads put it's quite high so no danger of the lbw
short of a length, straight, knocked into space at midwicket so that's the first run off the bat
141kph, back of a length at off stump, defended towards mid-off
length ball outside off, perhaps just a hint of movement away, opens the face down to third man
keeps it short of a length, nothing driveable so far, pushed to the off side
touch fuller, at middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on who is deep enough to allow the single...apart from the wide a very good opening over
starts with a full toss on the pads, but only costs a single as it's clipped to deep midwicket
full at off stump, flicked through midwicket and Ashwin chases it himself into a big vacant space
that's a strong shot, the first boundary of the match, Watson goes down on his back knee and sweeps a straight delivery backward of square
drags the length back, pushed to mid-off
that one swings away, beats the outside edge as Watson aims a big shot down the ground
dragged down short but it's another dot as Watson pulls to square leg without much timing
back of a length at the stumps, worked backward of square as he closes the face
short of a length, he heaves across the line, the bat twists in his hand and he mistimes towards midwicket
hammered down the ground as du Plessis gets his boundary away. Took a skip down the pitch, gave himself a touch of room, and drove on the up straight of mid-off
walked down the pitch again and threads the gap square through the off side as he drives a back-of-a-length delivery. That's very well done
goes full, a yorker, and it's an excellent delivery which du Plessis jabs down on with the toe end
brings out the scoop...and goes all the way! That's a terrific shot from du Plessis, he moved across his crease to a short-of-a-length delivery and sent it way over short fine leg
starts round the wicket, short outside off, Watson plays and misses with his cut
a slower ball bouncer, Watson ducks underneath, it really stuck in the pitch
fuller, at the stumps, Watson hanging leg-side and swings down to long-on
stays round the wicket, full and straight, he pushes forward and gets a thickish inside edge through square leg
gets the yorker in, all Watson can do is drive it into the off side...pressure building on Watto
short of a length, he goes for the pull from a crouched position, comes off the splice but falls short of deep midwicket. Kings XI probably won't mind he's kept the strike
that's a poor start, a back-of-a-length delivery angled into the pads, Watson is able to swing it wide of short fine leg ti relieve some pressure
over long-off! How quickly things can change, Watson catches up in two balls, drives through the line of a fuller delivery outside off...handsomely struck
short outside off, pulled from the front foot to deep square
another slower ball variety, du Plessis mistimes his drive back to the bowler
that's massive! It's been a horror start for Tye, this time du Plessis launches into a full delivery, right in the slot, sends it into the crowd over long-on
a dragged down slower ball outside off, lack of a pace means he's through his shot and scuttles off the toe end to cover
still round the wicket, full and straight, driven to mid-off on the edge of the circle
length ball at off stump, 134kph, dabbed to backward point with an open face
a short delivery, pace off, outside off stump, dragged into the leg side without any timing...took an age to reach him

dropped, and nearly an injury! A short-of-a-length delivery is hammered straight back at the bowler, Curran can't get his hands to it and it smacks into his shoulder. Luckily avoided the face. He takes a moment to compose himself but seems okay
full and straight, can't get it through the field and nails his drive too well as it reaches mid-off too quickly for a single
that undoes some of the good work, angles this one into the pads and Watson plays something close to sweep to get it wide of short fine leg
over the wicket, good length, pushed to cover
fuller, at the stumps, nice delivery, du Plessis taps to the off side
starts with three dot balls, this is very full and driven back to the bowler
well bowled! Beats du Plessis' sweep, pitches on middle, grips and spins to beat the off stump. Lovely delivery
shorter outside off, some width to work with, square driven to the cover sweeper
beaten! This turns as well, just short of a length outside off, beats Watson's attempt to drive off the back foot. A superb over
full at the stumps, clipped along the ground to deep midwicket
taken at deep midwicket! There's the breakthrough. Went for a slog-sweep, against the longer boundary, takes the top edge and it's very well judged by Curran
short outside off, he waits on the back foot and drives to deep cover
round the wicket, back of a length, Raina leans back to leg and drives to long-off
very short outside off, not sure what variation that was out, only costs a single as he finds deep cover. Different run-up from Ashwin
speared very wide outside off, he'll need to bowl that again
short of a length outside off, punched to cover off the back foot. A real mixture of stuff from Ashwin and he found the breakthrough
short on off stump, heaved to deep midwicket
over the wicket, leans forward and defends back to the bowler
very full outside off, on the popping crease, angled to short third man
lofted straight down the ground, a googly on off stump, lands comfortably short of long-off
a shorter delivery which comes very slowly off the surface, turned into the leg side
a shortish ball outside off but the lack of pace making it hard work, pulled to long-on. He's doing a very good job
over the wicket, short of a length, tucked into midwicket
short of a length, straight, pulled firmly to deep square leg
fuller, at off stump, angled to short third man but can't find the gap
there's one of his slower balls, short on off stump, Raina lets it go through...think he was expecting a wide call
wider outside off, Raina reaches a long way from his body, manages to send it wide of short third man for a much-needed boundary
outside leg stump, tucked off the pads to deep square leg
length ball around off, goes back and taps it towards short midwicket for a single
short outside off, goes back and pull it in front of square, fielder there
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-off
a low full toss outside off but only a single as Faf hits it towards sweeper cover
fuller on the stumps, pushed gently towards extra cover, ambles for a single and tries to sneak in the second but has to be happy with only one as the fielder was close to the ball
drives inside out against this tossed up delivery outside off, long-off moves to his right, bends low to keep it to two
flatter on the stumps, pushes it down the wicket
length ball on the stumps, du Plessis uses his feet and lofts it dead straight, over the bowler's head, didn't try to hit it too hard
dances down the track once again but Ashwin shortens his length and bowls it wide outside off, du Plessis does well to chop it back towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, pushes it towards long-on for a walking single
length ball, goes back and punches it past the non-striker, Agarwal at long-on is quick to cut it off
carrom ball this time, du Plessis was once again coming down the ground, ends up mistiming it back towards the bowler
fuller on the stumps, Raina comes forward and just chips it over the bowler's head, only a single though as long-on cuts it off
swept and swept hard, a flat six to bring up his fifty off 33 balls. His fourth six of the innings to go with two fours. Was a touch fuller outside off and he just drilled it over deep square leg
a low full toss outside off, ends up hitting it straight to the point fielder
flatter and wider outside off, spins away sharply  and perhaps too much, du Plessis was looking to come down but then stays back and leaves it alone
fuller on the pads, pushed towards long-on
fuller around off, drives it towards long-off from the front foot
a full toss on the pads, whips it towards deep square leg
length ball on the stumps, backs away and drags it towards midwicket
fuller outside off, goes aerial but doesn't middle it, ends up skying over and behind extra cover, lands between two fielders
length ball on the stumps, clears his front leg and looks to go over long-on, doesn't middle it as it's a carrom ball, Miller takes a neat catch at long-on with fingers pointing upwards
and timber. Length ball around off and middle from around the wicket, Raina looks to sweep it towards midwicket, misses it altogether and Ashwin has two in two
a carrom ball around off, comes forward and pushes it down the wicket
short and wide, taps it on its head for a single to sweeper cover
fuller outside off, drives it towards sweeper cover, only a single
length outside off, hits it firmly but straight to the extra cover fielder
length around off, coming in with the angle, Dhoni was a tad early into the shot, ends up pushing it back towards the bowler
length outside off and Dhoni looks to hammer it down the ground, gets it from the toe end of the bat, Miller puts in the slide to his right from mid-off to keep it to one
length around off, skips down the track and goes over extra cover, not from the middle of the bat enough to clear the infield and beat Miller's chase and the subsequent slide
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards the right of long-on, only a single
slower length ball around off, tucked away towards short fine leg

length ball around off, keeps a bit low, Dhoni gets his bat down in time to tap it in front of square, Dhoni wanted the run but Rayudu is ball watching in the middle of the pitch, a direct hit and Rayudu would have been out
length outside off, looks to run it down, misses
short of length around off, pulls it towards square leg, another dot. Just a single so far from this over
banged in short, a slower bouncer angling down the leg side, Dhoni leaves it allow thinking it would called a wide, the umpire doesn't think so
another slower one, length ball around off, works it towards long-on
fuller around off, looks to slog it away, mistimes it towards long-on
length ball outside off, stands back and steers it towards point
a slower length ball, wide outside off, Dhoni was early into the shot, checks his shot and hits it towards long-off, sprints back for the second
short of length, angling across, slapped towards midwicket
fuller outside off, goes down on one knee and looks to swipe it away, misses
in the blockhole, Rayudu digs it out towards long-on. Another excellent over
length outside off, goes for the cut but doesn't time it well, chopped towards point
slower length ball, comes down the track and pulls it towards deep midwicket, Curran puts in the chase from wide long-on and pulls it inside
fuller outside off, Dhoni was coming down the track but it's a touch too wide, let's it go
short of length at the batsman, Dhoni mistimes the pull towards square leg
fuller outside off, moves across and looks to smash it towards midwicket, doesn't get the timing right, only a single
powered down the ground this time, uses his feet and forces it towards the right of long-off, it's drilled so hard that he has no chance to cut it off
a slower bouncer on middle and leg, Dhoni pulls it down towards fine leg

fuller but down the leg side this time, Dhoni goes for the flick but cannot get any bat on it, called a wide. But Ashwin has decided to review it! For caught-behind! Nothing on the UltraEdge and it stays not out
clubbed over deep midwicket this time, was fuller on the pads and Dhoni frees his arms and it keeps sailing over
slower length ball outside off, cuts it towards extra cover for one
fuller and angling away from the batsman, Rayudu carves it away towards sweeper cover

one-bouncer four this time, didn't middle it but still got enough and in the gap more importantly. Length ball on the stumps and Dhoni swings across, got it off the toe-end but that's enough for a boundary
fuller and outside off, changes the line but the result stays the same, Dhoni lofts it inside out over extra cover, the man at sweeper cover didn't have a chance
a low full toss outside off and Dhoni has steered it through the point region, the sweeper cover sprints to his left this time and keeps it to two
fuller on the stumps, in the slot for Rayudu who clears his front leg and smashes it over long-on, brings up the 50-run stand with that six - off 35 balls
fuller outside off this time, smashed along the ground but straight towards extra cover, only a single
bowls a bouncer this time with fine leg up - a cardinal sin. Dhoni pulls it over the fielder and collects a boundary
short of length and pulled again towards fine leg, only a single this time
a full toss outside off, goes for the reverse tap but mistimes it towards short third man. For a moment it looked like he made a neat connection but will have to be happy with only a single
fuller, almost a yorker on the leg stump, Dhoni clips it towards deep midwicket, only a single
good length at off stump, hint of swing, plays forward to the off side
on middle and off, gets nicely forward and plays it straight of mid-on
full, very wide outside off, actually pitches beyond the popping crease, left alone and a wide
keeps it full, swings back in towards off stump, Gayle drives and gets a thick outside edge between short third man and backward point
swing and miss! His intentions are clean. Aims to send a delivery outside off straight down the ground but only finds fresh air
well bowled, tight on middle and off, shapes back at Gayle who pushes into midwicket
full outside off, pushes at it with hard hands and finds cover
round the wicket, full at the stumps, defended to cover
drives at this one on off stump, squirts off a thickish outside edge to backward point
well bowled! This spins from outside off, bounces too as it climbs past the edge

caught behind! Full outside off, Gayle goes for a booming drive away from his body, the umpire's finger goes up. Gayle just stands there for a little while, unsure whether to review or not, has a brief chat with Rahul and then walks (slowly) off. Ultra Edge confirms a nick
over the wicket, back of a length outside off, forced into midwicket and a good piece of fielding prevents the run
taken at long-on! That's poor batting...charged down the pitch, was nowhere near the ball, he slices across the ball and it only finds Faf du Plessis stationed near the fence
full and straight, clipped firmly to midwicket
short of a length outside off, 128kph, played off the back foot to the off side
fuller, at off stump, tapped into the off side
a shorter delivery, 131kph, hitting the splice hard as it's pushed to the off side...there's a direct hit from Jadeja as he runs in from point, batsman is well home and it's an overthrow
good length outside off, defended to a very close point
touch shorter, 133kph, he hangs back and angles down to third man
works a straight delivery off his pads behind square
eases this down the ground to long-on
nudged into midwicket
comes down the pitch, this delivery is outside off stump, clipped towards midwicket where Raina can't intercept with a dive
flatter, straighter, flicked nicely wide of deep midwicket
down the pitch again, think Harbhajan saw him coming, pushes the delivery to long-on
top shot! Full at off stump, Rahul pings it straight of mid-on with the perfect drive
short outside off, angled towards backward point, Jadeja dives and has probably prevented another boundary with that dive
short again, outside off, punched into the covers off the back foot but can't find the gap
back of a length at off stump, 130kph, a bottom-handed whip through midwicket
into the stands as Chahar drops short, Rahul latches with a wonderfully sweet pull shot. Saw that very early
back-to-back boundaries as he gets a thin nick on this down the leg side, wide enough to be away from Dhoni...was angled into the pads, probably didn't mean to flick it quite so fine
goes for six first ball as a full delivery outside off is sliced high over backward point
short outside off, 129kph, runs it down to third man with an open face
excellent work at the second of two short third man fielders, this was a fuller delivery, sliced away and the dive saved two runs
full outside off, very nicely forward and drives to deep cover
full outside off, a very powerful drive but finds cover on the edge of the circle
back of a length outside off, angled down to third man...he came back decently after that first-ball six
round the wicket, skims past the top edge as he looks to play square. Some extra bounce
pulled from outside off into midwicket
goes back in the crease and tucks a straight delivery into midwicket
worked into the gap at midwicket again
short of a length, straight, driven back to the bowler
another dot ball, back of a length at middle and off, no width and not much pace to work with, can't find a gap on the leg side. Tidy over
straight, good length, a slider out of the front of hand, played back to him

big appeal for lbw, it's a googly, takes pad first but did he get outside off? Tahir was keen, but Dhoni decides not to review. Actually, impact was fine but maybe going down leg side. But the replay shows three reds. Oops
heaves a full toss out to deep midwicket, superb fielding from Jadeje
full at middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket
gets forward and plays to the on side
touch short outside off, plays back and cuts it through point, excellent placement as it beats the sweeper
worked off the pads to deep midwicket
that's very delicate, goes through Dhoni's legs as he opens the face, and runs to short third man
angled to short third man

short of a length outside off, terrific placement as he drives square off the back foot and beats the cover sweeper. Kuggeleijn puts in a big drive and takes a huge divot out with his knee. Could have been nasty
uses his feet and then drives along the ground to long-off
full, pushed into the pads, sweeps to deep square leg
another huge appeal! Think for caught behind. Was a nice leg-break which spun and beat the edge. Dhoni also went for the stumping
shorter, worked into the leg side
full at off stump, presses forward and pushes to cover
worked off the pads through midwicket
goes for the reverse sweep, full at off stump, can't beat short third man
whips a low full toss to deep midwicket
length around off, goes back and works it towards square leg
length around off, stays back and tucks it away towards midwicket
length again, just outside off, punched towards long-on off the back foot
flatter and quicker outside off, left alone
arm ball around off, comes forward and blocks
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep point
a slower yorker on middle and leg, clipped away fine and Sarfaraz sprints back for the second, there was an appeal for lbw but Sarfaraz shows the bat to the umpire
fuller around off, bends down and scoops it over the keeper's head, one-bounce four
length ball but down the leg side, wide this time
short of length, angling down the leg side, Sarfaraz helps it on its way to fine leg
length around off, stays beside the line and punches it towards cover-point for one
fuller around off and Sarafraz just shows the full face of the bat, extending his arms to loft it over long-off, 83 metres
in the blockhole, Sarfaraz digs it out down the ground, long-on comes across to cut it off
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it straight towards point
flatter and quicker, length outside off, goes back and punches it towards sweeper cover
fuller on the pads, pushes it towards the vacant midwicket region, Jadeja puts in the chase himself but cannot prevent the second run

flatter on the stumps, goes for the paddle but the ball hasn't gone anywhere. Dhoni picks it up and flicks at the stumps to hit direct, the LED lights lit up but the bails sit back in their grooves. Rahul was short of his ground despite putting in the dive, they collect an overthrow though
length around off, a single towards backward point
fuller around off, comes forward and opens the face to run it towards short third man, no run
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep point
fuller and flatter on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
length around off, comes forward and turns it towards short midwicket
down the track, Harbhajan pulls the length back, Sarfaraz looks to push at it, almost ends up chipping to short midwicket, one bounce to the fielder
a touch fuller, driven towards long-on for a walking single
length around off and middle, turns it towards the right of short midwicket
length around off, comes forward and turns it towards square leg
and that's fifty for Sarfaraz, fuller around off, drives it towards long-off for an easy single
length around off, comes forward and finds extra cover with drive
fuller on the stumps, stands in the crease and drives it towards wide long-off
short of length outside off, flatter and quicker, cuts it towards backward point and sets off
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover for one more
short of length outside off, stays back and punches it towards extra cover
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards the right of deep midwicket for a couple
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on for one, brings up his fifty as well
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover, a direct hit at the keeper's end, Rahul was in but they won't get any overthrows as short third man backs up
a reverse sweep to short third man and they scamper for another single
length around off, stays in the crease and ends up chopping it towards the bowler
fuller around off, goes back and cuts it towards deep point, only a single
a googly around off, works it towards midwicket with the spin
fuller on the stumps, almost a yorker, digs it out towards long-on
looks to tonk it over deep midwicket, was tossed up around off, gets beaten as it spins away
slider on middle and leg, tucked away towards midwicket for one
a full toss but Rahul can only hit it towards long-on, once again only a single, just five from the over
short of length around off and middle, goes for the pull but doesn't get the timing right, a single to midwicket
slower length ball outside off, goes for the pull but ends up hitting it towards long-off, 114 kph that one
another slower one from Kuggeleijn, length outside off, Rahul goes for the pull but no timing at all on this, Jadeja comes in from deep midwicket to accept a simple catch
length ball on middle and leg, moves across and swipes it towards fine leg, fielder there, so only a single
fuller around off, and he has just smashed it down the ground, long-off had no chance
fuller again, angling across this time, looks to swipe across but misses
slower one gone wrong, slipped out of the hand, a high full toss way outside off and Sarfaraz has steered it over backward point
another back-of-the-hand slower ball, another high full toss, Sarfaraz chips it over backward point, only a couple
a brilliant yorker this time, Sarfaraz jams his bat at it and can only get a single
once again in the blockhole, Miller can only dig it towards long-off for one
a slower length ball, cannot get the timing right on the pull, a single to backward square leg
slower length ball outside off, Miller mistimes it towards long-off
another slower one, short of length around off, pulls it behind square, fine leg comes in to keep it to one
the leg stump takes a walk! Was fuller and in the slot, Miller looks to send it out of Chennai but misses completely, and the leg stick is out of its groove
short of length outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket for a couple
short of length outside off, a slower one, Sarfaraz jumps in the air but cannot connect at all
length outside off, goes for the reverse scoop but cannot connect
fuller on the stumps, Sarfaraz looks to go big, but gets only the height, du Plessis backpedals at long-on and takes it with fingers pointing upwards
length ball around off, punches it towards long-off
length ball, angling across the batsman who fails to connect
